name: Fruitables (2?)
description:
This is a sequel to "Fruitables", which was only available on Android. I will try to make this game android as well.

The revamped version to a game I enjoyed creating! Use many fruits(Because of the cherry, the cake counts) to fend off many vegetables. There are more new additions to the game, including  more mechanics that force you to stay alert. Many  more maps(Including an endless game mode), and even boss battles at the end of each round(Except endless of course). 

A fun and relaxing game if you are bored!

Made by GiantMarble Studios(Still haven't made a logo for it but it exists, trust me.)
